divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2100 hrs. a paid observerver noticed in northwest sky to bright objects one moved left going west and, stooped and moved again up and around 2nd object no threat to public ct. state were not called no reason or the big boys, if it was a threat protocal would have been exacuted. Interesting not ours. A fellow co-worker know for honesty and has good char.... end of report. This is for your records no need to contact me.
